snippet: A report from the Department of Health and Human Services says a state agency lacks independence from the governor’s office and has broken several requirements of federal law.
abstract: Report from the Health and Human Services Dept charges New York State with poor oversight of its Commission on Quality of Care and Advocacy for Persons With Disabilities, and accuses it of breaking federal law mandates; federal government, which provides billions of dollars in Medicaid money to New York, has given the Cuomo administration limited time to respond to the report.
lead_paragraph: A report from the Department of Health and Human Services says a state agency lacks independence from the governor’s office and has broken several requirements of federal law.
